entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who is feeling tired and scared. He is mentioned as having a conversation with Dumbledore and being approached by Cho Chang under the mistletoe.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person who has given Harry advice to stay. He is thanked by Harry for nothing.

entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: A person who approached Harry under the mistletoe less than twenty-four hours ago.

entities.name: mistletone
entities.description: A location where Cho Chang approached Harry.

relationships.description: Cho Chang approached Harry under the mistletoe.
